summary: Provides a Qt modal dialog that orchestrates the migration of legacy JSON tag data from version 9.4 to the newer SQLiteâ€‘based schema used in version 9.5+, handling data validation, progress reporting, and UI feedback while running the conversion in a background thread.
business_intent: Ensures existing users can upgrade the application without losing or corrupting their tag data, delivering a smooth, automated migration experience that maintains data integrity and informs the user of progress and any issues.
